title: Stuck on Authentificating
body:
So, the first time I try to login I get this message: http://prntscr.com/f039tt.
The second time, however, I get stuck on "Authenticating...": http://prntscr.com/f039yn.
I have tried everything in the Connection issues manual. Help would be appreciated.
Also tried everything from the Login issues page... My Internet works fine with everything else.
Please help me this message just ruined my day -.-

replies.body: So Riot wrote they fixed it but they obviously didnt...
It's been awhile since you first posted this, but it looks like most of the EU issues were cleared up by now. Definitely hit me back up if you're still having problems getting logged in though!

Actually after several tries,I finally connected then I started a game but the loading screen never loaded, the game was remade and I was put in a lower priority queue by Leaverbuster. How great is that?
its shit i feel sorry for you... Well i managed to get inside and just played a normal to test if everything is working and it somehow did... well im happy it worked for me.{{champion:103}}
